main event: A civilian observer reported a bright red light low on the horizon observed in Fairborn, Ohio, on May 9, 1967, remaining stationary for 15 minutes.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 15 minutes with no significant changes in its position., The sky was overcast at the time of observation, limiting visibility of stars., Witness had a history of sightings but had trouble recalling specifics from this observation., The light was bright and likely metallic in appearance, estimated to be 40 feet in diameter., Another intelligence investigation involved a similar sighting a few days later in the same area.
witness description: Civilian observer with a history of multiple UFO sightings.
